Your Data Your Rights Your Rights as a Data Subject As a data subject under S.34 - S.38 of the NDPA, you have: Right to be informed Right to access Right to rectification Right to object to processing Right to report to supervisory authority Right to restrict processing Right to data portability Right to be forgotten Right not to be subjected to automated decision making Read More Your Responsibility as a Data Controller As an organization that determines the purpose and manner for processing data, your responsibility under S.29 of NDPA is to ensure methods by which data is collected is strictly in line with the principles of Data Protection. Read More Your Role as a Data Processor As a data processor under S.29 of NDPA, your role is to ensure that data processing is in accordance with the governing principles of processing data on behalf of the controller.
